page.title: 06Alvaston Hall.
page.content: Alvaston Hall, built in 1865, has 12 acres of land and is valued at Â£1.5M. It has orginally a privte house,but is a hotel.In 1972 it had ten lettable bedrooms. But now has 94 bedrooms. Costing Â£37.50 a night to rent. Present activities include, Ghost hunting weekend, Cludo,(played around the house),discos,half court tennis.Opening after christmas 1985: A new pubs and squash courts. {THE GHOST STORY Before Alvaston hall was built there was a fire at a house where the hall now stands.A lady was rushing about trying to find her husband, but when she could not find him she thought he was dead so she jumped of the balcony and killed herself.But apparently her husband was at the local pub.Now she comes back as a ghost to find her husband.
